entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Resolute
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:06 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -33.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Resolute Airport 11:34 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -33.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -54
Dewpoint: -37.6°C
Wind: NNW 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Blowing snow. High minus 31.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Blowing snow. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 31. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blowing snow at times. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 33. Wind chill near minus 51. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 30.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny near noon. Blowing snow at times. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 52 in the morning and minus 47 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
